name.baseName: Gas Purification ; Coke ; Coking coal ; Mashing ; All sizes; NESPS2
煤气净化 ; 焦炭 ; 炼焦煤 ; 捣固 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisBiochemical treatment + post-treatment + advanced treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisBiochemical treatment + post-treatment + advanced treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业流程涉及煤气净化和炼焦煤生产焦炭，适用于所有规模的炼焦作业。该数据集代表了来自上述流程的废水污染处理技术，重点关注的污染物包括化学需氧量、氨氮、石油相关废物、苯酚、氰化物、总磷和有机结合氮。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码25,四级代码2521文件，在完整版文件中第2880页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisBiochemical treatment + post-treatment + advanced treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是生化处理+后处理+深度处理，其效率为97，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution cyanideisBiochemical treatment + post-treatment + advanced treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95
污染物指标氰化物的末端治理技术是生化处理+后处理+深度处理，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氰化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氰化物
